pullrequest.title: Second part of data logging GUI

content.raw:
I like it! It's direct and to the point.

One comment: the name of the log file is displayed while you are recording, but it disappears once you stop recording. I don't know the best way to solve it, but my first thought after stopping the recording was to look for the file name so I could copy and paste it, but it was gone. Also, I guess we can't select that text to copy it. I can file an enhancement request for this if you don't want to address it now.
content.html:
I like it! It's direct and to the point.

One comment: the name of the log file is displayed while you are recording, but it disappears once you stop recording. I don't know the best way to solve it, but my first thought after stopping the recording was to look for the file name so I could copy and paste it, but it was gone. Also, I guess we can't select that text to copy it. I can file an enhancement request for this if you don't want to address it now.
